name: .EPIM File Extension
summary: Learn about .EPIM files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: File used by EssentialPIM, a personal information manager; stores your personal data, such as added tasks, notes, contacts, passwords, calendar items, and appointments.

content: To create an EPIM file, select File → New → EPIM Data File.
EPIM files are located in the following directory: C:\​Users\​kellenbloom\​AppData\​Roaming\​EssentialPIM Pro\​

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
